title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Queen Elizabeth in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Queen Elizabeth in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq This Imam Al-Sadiq says that seeing Queen Elizabeth in a dream shows the mature mind that the dreamer has, and God knows best. Also, seeing Queen Elizabeth in a dream indicates personal strength, self-confidence, and walking in a high position. If a married woman sees this vision, it indicates On the mother’s happiness with the success of her children and their bright future in the future. The interpretation of seeing Queen Elizabeth in a dream may indicate the coming of goodness and the opening of the door of livelihood from which the dreamer does not expect. Rather, seeing the dead queen in a dream indicates the coming of goodness and the fulfillment of many goals and dreams that one desires. Achievement. Interpretation of seeing Queen Elizabeth in a dream for a single woman: Seeing the Queen in an unmarried girl’s dream may indicate a close marriage with the person she wants to marry. It also indicates excellence and success in her academic and professional life and indicates her personal strength. Also, seeing the Queen’s death in a dream It indicates the achievement of goals and dreams and entering new jobs. And if he sees in a dream that he is sitting with the Queen, this indicates food, blessings, and many good things, and God knows best. Seeing Queen Elizabeth in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she has met the Queen, this indicates the collapse of all disputes and sorrows. Between her and her husband. Also, seeing Queen Elizabeth in a married girl’s dream indicates the happiness she will see and a high status. Indeed, seeing the death of the Queen in a dream for a married woman indicates that she will soon become pregnant and give birth to a child with a beautiful face and a good spirit. If the woman sees that her husband is holding the Queen’s hand This is a sign of imminent weakness and the woman’s obedience to her husband’s orders in reality. Interpretation of seeing Queen Elizabeth in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is holding the Queen’s hand and begging her, this indicates the ease of her pregnancy period. Also, seeing Queen Elizabeth in her dream indicates status. High status for her husband and a lot of sustenance that he will soon see in his life. But if she sees that she is sitting next to the Queen, this indicates the high status of her child and that she will take her child from her. Interpretation of seeing Queen Elizabeth in a dream for a man If a single man sees the Queen in his dream, this indicates a rise in his marriage A confidant of the girl he loves. Likewise, if he sees the death of the queen in a dream, this means sustenance, a lot of money, participation in a new business and hard work. But if a married man sees that he is talking to the queen, this indicates good conditions for a better position and position. High and focused. Also, seeing Queen Elizabeth in a dream generally indicates opening the door to livelihood and excellence in life and good work. Interpretation of dreams that I am a queen in a dream Whoever sees in a dream that he has become a king, this indicates a lot of goodness and a great position for the pioneer. If a woman sees If a married woman dreams that she has become a queen in her dream, this indicates the song and happiness that she will see in her life. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment.

title: Interpretation of a rooster in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a rooster’s cry in a dream on Moments, the largest website in the Middle East about the interpretation of dreams and the extent of their impact on our public and private lives, and how to avoid their side effects and benefit from their benefits. A person can see a rooster and hear its cry in a dream, and the person becomes confused about the interpretation of this vision, and many people become optimistic. Of women and men with this vision, because the cry of a rooster is actually something worthy of praise. It is also said to indicate seeing angels, but seeing a rooster and hearing its voice in a dream indicates good or evil, as the rooster indicates a person with high energy and voice, such as the muezzin and authority, which is below the norm. Who else, because with its huge crown, beard and wings, it is domesticated so that it cannot fly, so it belongs because Noah, peace be upon him, entered the rooster and the ark. When the water ran out and he did not get permission from Almighty God to take out those with him in the ark, the shipyard asked Noah to allow him By going out to inform him of the news of the waters and taking the rooster hostage with him. To him. So Abu Aoun came to Ibn Shirin, and narrated this dream to him, and Ibn Shirin said to him: If your dream is true, you will die after thirty-four days, and he mixed the drink and broke it. How do you withdraw it? He said from the camel's bill: Because the signifier is four, the ya is ten, and the k is twenty. Interpretation of seeing a rooster crowing in a dream. Interpretation of a rooster by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen says that the rooster in a dream is one of the praiseworthy things. If a person sees in a dream that a rooster crows, this means early marriage for the young man if he is single, but if the person sees A rooster crowing in the dark, this indicates that the person feels despair and extreme sadness, and that this person cries a lot at night, but if a person sees in a dream that “there are roosters fighting,” this means that this person will leave his family and be separated from them. Because of disputes and marital infidelity. Interpretation of seeing a rooster in a dream Commentators say that seeing a rooster in a dream, regardless of the color of the muezzin, if one dreams that he kills a rooster or slaughters a rooster and that rooster crows, this means that this person does not respond to the call of God and that he hears the voice of the muezzin and does not go to. Supplication. The red rooster in a dream refers to a person who has many undesirable qualities and this person has a bad reputation and a lot of empty talk. Ibn Sirin narrates about it. Interpretation of seeing a rooster in a dream: A married woman shows that she is a loyal husband, especially if that lady sees that there is a rooster in her bed, and if She saw that there was a white rooster, this indicates the happiness of that lady and a lot of happiness. Seeing a rooster in a pregnant woman’s dream means that she will be blessed with a son from Almighty God.

Duaa. The red rooster in a dream indicates a person who has many undesirable qualities and this person has a bad reputation and a lot of empty talk. Ibn Sirin narrates about it the interpretation of seeing a rooster in a dream. The married woman shows that she is a faithful husband, especially if that lady sees that there is a rooster in her bed, and if she sees that there is a white rooster, this indicates the happiness of that lady and a lot of happiness. Seeing a rooster in a pregnant woman’s dream means that she will be blessed with a son from God Almighty.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a handsome boy for an unmarried woman and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a handsome boy. The interpretation of dreams comes from religious sciences and is an interpretation of what a person sees in a dream, but the interpretation of any dream can be identical to reality or just dreams as a result of the ideas that come to his mind. Interpretation of this dream and find out whether it indicates good or bad. A person can see in his dream many things that may have evidence that expresses the mood of the fortuneteller. In this article we will report the interpretation of the dream that gives birth to a beautiful boy. Interpretation of the dream of giving birth to a handsome boy for a married woman’s vision. Giving birth to a beautiful child in a dream indicates goodness for the dreamer. In reality, childbirth is one of the beautiful and beloved things for a person, and it can herald the end of worries and receive happy news about the dreamer. In this article we will present a report on the interpretation of a dream about the birth of a handsome boy for a married woman: Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a handsome boy, The dream may indicate that the dreamer will gain sudden money, such as obtaining an inheritance and inheritance. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a beautiful boy The dream can indicate the end of problems and the return of stability and calm. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a handsome boy indicates that the dreamer will give birth to a male child. The beauty of the child may indicate in The dream indicates the good morals of the husband. The dream may refer to the complexion of a married woman who suffers from a delayed pregnancy and the birth of a child. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a sister hugging her brother in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing the birth of a child in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation scholars have confirmed that seeing the birth of a child in a dream indicates There are many interpretations in the life of a married woman regarding different circumstances that the wife goes through during the dream. The dream may reflect events that occurred in her life with her husband: Interpretation of a dream about a married woman giving birth to a male child indicates the problems that a married woman faces in her life for various reasons. A woman may face many problems in her life with her husband or even the husband’s family, and these problems may cause separation. If a married woman feels that she has given birth to a male child and is happy, this indicates the miserable life that the woman lives. It could be a fantasy of the subconscious due to her strong desire to To have a friend. Seeing a dreamer married to a handsome boy in a dream symbolizes abundance of sustenance, similar to inheritance for her and her family. But if a married woman who dreams of a beautiful child is suffering, this indicates the end of disputes and problems between her and her husband. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a handsome boy For a single woman: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a handsome boy: A dream about giving birth to a handsome boy for a married woman who is not pregnant indicates many things that a married woman takes into consideration, and interpreters have confirmed that this dream has many interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a handsome boy: If a married woman sees that she has given birth to a male child and his appearance is beautiful, this indicates that she will enter into her life new people whom she will trust a lot and may be disappointed by them. If a married woman sees that she has given birth to a girl, this is a sign of happiness, kindness, and new nourishment in her life. The dreaming life of a woman and a girl means nourishment and blessings that enter into a neighborhood

title: Interpretation of seeing a cake in a dream according to Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cake in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Seeing tart in Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation indicates that you will escape from problems and difficulties. If you know, this means your sincerity in matters of religion, but if you are chained and imprisoned, it is a manifestation of innocence and liberation, and if you are traveling, absent from your family, this means returning. Home, and you are sick, cake means recovery from illness and also a cake shows happy news and a wonderful beautiful life. It also interprets seeing a cake in a dream as a source of great and good livelihood, God willing, and it can also be interpreted that the good that happens in a dream about a cake, happens to a big cake. If it is large, then it is good and plentiful. Even if it is small, this is a limited diet, but God blesses it and increases it, God willing. Today we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a cake in a dream in detail, as well as its interpretation. You see a cake in a dream for a single girl. Interpretation of seeing a cake in a dream: Interpretation. Seeing a cake in a dream means marrying a single person, a divorced woman, or an orphan. If you disobey God Almighty, the vision means that you are returning to the path of truth and repentance. If you are an employer and breadwinner, then you are happy with your work. Candy means that the ruler can continue to provide food without removing or removing it. If you fry this sugar in oil, it means cooperation Good and useful with others. If the cake is good, your problems will disappear as if nothing had happened. Eating sugar in a dream indicates longevity and recovery from illness. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing cake in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about cake for a married woman: Interpretation of your dream: Cake in a dream for a woman A married woman means saying good things to her and in prosperity and well-being. Eating cake means that new relationships and friendships can change her life. Seeing a cake means success in life or work. Seeing pieces of eggs scattered everywhere means that wonderful personal relationships will change your life for the better in your life. Upcoming and perhaps a new post. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see Basbousa in a dream Interpretation of a cake in a dream for a single woman: Interpretation Seeing the cake in a dream for an unmarried woman is a clear indication of the good that is coming in your life. And if this woman is a virgin, then the source of livelihood that this virgin will bring It is marriage to a rich, generous man. If the girl is suffering from problems with her family because of marriage, then those problems will end. An unmarried woman dreams of a cake that she stands at the door of the store to buy, which means that she is working hard to achieve her goals and will pay more than she can afford, but what she is looking for It will come true soon. Just making a cake can waste a lot of time and energy. In a dream, this is a girl who is useful to people and has great love for those around her. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Qatayef in a dream. Interpretation of cake in a dream for a pregnant woman: If you see the pregnant woman as if she is eating the cake, or if she sees the cake at home The dream is a safety message for that woman, as she may have recently had a miscarriage and the fetus may be aborted. Since the cake is made for birthdays and weddings, this means that the

title: Learn more about the interpretation of a car accident and its meaning in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an accident in a dream with a car: Road accidents are among the things that frighten car drivers or car owners, and therefore it is necessary to teach important driving rules so that the person is not exposed to many human or material losses, and choosing the route the travel will take has an important role in avoiding any accident. A car in a dream: If a single woman sees in a dream a horrific car accident, this is evidence of the emotional and social differences that he is currently experiencing. A car accident for a single woman in her dream is evidence that her life in reality is unstable, whether she is suffering from problems with her family or problems at work, and the vision It determines how far these problems will go, that is, whether a single woman saw that she was injured in a car accident and was able to get out of it without serious consequences. This is evidence that all the crises that she will go through are just a period of her life and will pass without any problems, but if she sees in the vision that she cannot get out of the car when it turns over or the car explodes while she is there. If he was in it, this is evidence that he went through disasters in reality, and it will take a long time to get over it and recover from its psychological impact. The occurrence of a car accident in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she is entering into some crises, either financial crises, problems with her children, or crises related to her work, If a woman works in a certain job. Dreaming of a small child being run over by a car in a dream, this is evidence of this child’s extreme fear, and this vision confirms that he is suffering from some psychological disorders resulting from his parents’ harsh treatment of him. If a father dreams that his children were subjected to a violent car accident and that Their children were in their teens in reality, so this is evidence of their reckless and reckless behavior that will harm them. If the dreamer sees that one of his relatives was injured in an accident on the road, this is evidence that this person will face a lot of problems in reality, and he must be careful in dealing with people. Renew his life so he can do that. Do not get involved in any disaster or problem that he cannot solve. To get the correct interpretation, search on Google for an Egyptian dream interpretation website. What is the interpretation of a dream about a friend’s car accident? The friend that the dreamer sees had an accident, and was about to die, and this is evidence of This friend is suffering in reality, even if he does not show it, but in reality he is in great hardship and fatigue and needs someone to help him. For him, and therefore this vision carries the content of the message that he must stand by his friend to overcome his crisis safely. If the dreamer’s friend is sick and is in the hospital and the dreamer sees that he was involved in an accident but succeeded in it, then this is evidence that this friend will undergo a difficult surgery, But God saves him from this and he lives a peaceful life without fear of getting sick again. Interpretation of a dream about an accident occurring in a dream: Accidents in a dream are visions that cause panic in the dreamer and thus include many different interpretations depending on the dreamer’s gender, age, and life circumstances. With a friend, and he saw in his dream that a car hit him, then this vision is a sign that

title: Seeing shirt buttons in a dream

preview.html: Seeing shirt buttons in a dreamButtons are a tool for tying a buttonhole. The buttonhole is closed with the button. It can be on the shirt, dress, or cloak, as well as on pants. It is used for men's, women's, and children's clothing to close it. Closing the dress or trousers. Seeing a button or buttons in a dream has many meanings between good and evil and can mean: Seeing a button inside a dream. It refers to the dreamer’s customs, traditions, and principles that he grew up with. It also indicates the dreamer’s religiosity and infallibility. Seeing a button inside a dream, for an unmarried girl, this means Soon her engagement or marriage. If a girl sees that she is sewing buttons in her dream, this is a sign of the rich man in her life. title: Seeing an adulterous woman in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a prostitute is one of the dreams that disturbs the priest, because adultery is one of the taboos and major sins that God Almighty has forbidden us from committing and has ordered us to stay away from it at all times and forever. Interpretation of seeing a woman committing adultery in a dream When you see a woman practicing prostitution in a dream, this means that the owner of the vision feels distressed because he has gone through a financial or moral crisis in his work. Whoever sees himself committing adultery with a woman in a dream indicates that he will lose his money and the projects he has done or planned. Seeing a prostitute approaching me When a man sees a woman challenging and seducing him in a dream, this symbolizes that he will obtain money from forbidden things, so he must think carefully about his source of livelihood. Seeing a prostitute also indicates theft, as the thief disappears as the adulterer disappears. As for whoever dreams of committing adultery with a young woman, this indicates that his money is placed in an unsafe place. The meaning of seeing my friend's wife committing adultery Anyone who dreams of seeing a friend's wife committing adultery with him is a sign that the dreamer is thinking about betraying a friend as a result of previous differences with him and wishes for his departure. As for if he sees her committing adultery with someone Another, this indicates the calamity of his friend. The meaning of seeing an adulterous girl in a dream Prostitution in a dream It symbolizes betrayal as well as theft. When a man sees a girl starting to commit adultery with him, it shows his intention to commit adultery, but he is afraid of her. As for the one who saw himself in a dream committing adultery and being subjected to the punishment of Khand, this indicates that he is a strong and powerful ruler. The sign of the adulteress in a dream Who do you see yourself? Prostitution in a dream symbolizes that she is suffering from emotional failure in her life and wants to communicate and marry. As for the married woman who sees herself as an adulteress, this indicates her failure to maintain her feelings towards her husband. Whoever tried to entice a stranger to commit adultery with her in a dream indicates that she is the cause of problems with her husband and will end in divorce. As for the one who saw that her husband married her in a dream and was satisfied with that, this indicates that the benefit will come to her home. Add the dream you want to interpret with reference to the social status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing clouds with clothes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing clouds of clothing in a dream. Interpretation of seeing unzipped clothes in a dream indicates some openings and changes in the dreamer’s upcoming life. Seeing the zipper of a dress closed in a dream for a man indicates his inability to find the right woman. Seeing a broken zipper in a dream also indicates some difficulties that the dreamer will face. If you see yourself repairing a damaged zipper in a dream, this means that some pleasant changes will occur in a person’s life. Seeing a girl asking someone to open the clouds in a dream is good news of the coming of kindness, livelihood, and blessings. Interpretation of a dream about zipper clothes for a single woman. Seeing clouds of clothes in a dream For a girl, one of the visions that indicate protection and well-being from God. Seeing a broken dress in a dream for a girl indicates failure in her life and falling into some problems. Seeing someone she knows in reality unzipping a girl’s dress indicates that she will get married soon and will make her happy and happy. When she sees the same A girl spoils the dress of a girl she knows or her sister, as this indicates a heavy diet. Interpretation of a dream about clothes being a zipper for a married woman: Seeing clouds of clothes in a dream for a married woman is one of the visions that express the situation in which she lives. Also, seeing the husband taking off his clothes indicates the end of problems Between them. Also, broken clouds in a dream are considered unpleasant visions for a woman and a sign of divorce. Interpretation of dreams of zippers on clothes for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about seeing clouds of clothes in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that God will guide her mind and bring her happiness. Seeing clouds of a red dress in a dream is considered For a pregnant woman, it is a praiseworthy vision that indicates goodness and livelihood. Repairing a clothing zipper in a dream. Seeing repairing a clothing zipper in a dream means a calm and stable life and the end of problems and troubles. Also, seeing someone wearing a girl’s dress indicates that he will make a large profit from his work. Interpretation of a dream about an open dress zipper, seeing a zipper An open dress in a dream is one of the visions of fulfilling desires and entering a happy period. The interpretation of seeing the zipper of a dress open in a dream indicates good personal relationships and love between people. Interpretation of a dream of untying a dress: Seeing a white dress in a dream means kindness and blessings, and the dreamer fulfills some desires in his life. The vision of an open dress indicates Many dresses also indicate a lot of sustenance, money, and lawful profit from trade and business. Interpretation of a dream about a zipper lock: A zipper lock in a dream indicates the concealment and escape of a person from some difficult problems. title: What is the interpretation of menstruation in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Menstruation in a dream. Interpreters believe that the dream looks good and brings many tidings to the dreamer, but it portends bad in some cases. In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of the vision of menstruation for single, married, pregnant, and divorced women, according to the lips of Ibn Sirin and the leading scholars of interpretation. Menstruation in dreams. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation indicates that the dreamer will soon get rid of a certain problem he faced in the previous period, and if the dreamer gets married and sees his wife menstruating in a dream, this indicates that he will engage in a major conflict with her in the coming period and it may lead to their separation. If the man sees himself during the menstrual period, The dream does not bode well, but rather leads to him being exposed to many material and moral losses in the coming period. Menstruation in a dream symbolizes failure in practical life and difficulty achieving goals. In the event that the dreamer sees menstrual blood in her underwear, the dream indicates that she will face a big problem in the near future and will not get out of it easily. Menstruation in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that menstruation in a dream bodes well and indicates that the dreamer will experience some pleasant events in the coming days. , in a new phase of his life filled with prosperity and material well-being. If the dreamer is currently facing problems or difficulties and sees menstrual blood in his home, the dream may symbolize that he will soon get rid of these difficulties and relieve his pain. Vision: Fulfilling wishes and answering prayers, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees black menstruation in his dream, this means that he will go through some painful events in the near future and must be patient and content. The Dream Interpretation Online Site is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the world Al-Arabi, just write Dream Interpretation Website on the Internet Search for it in Google and get the correct interpretations. The symbol of menstruation in Al-Osaimi’s dream Al-Osaimi explains menstruation in a dream as a sign that the dreamer will receive a lot of happy news in her life during the coming period, which will help spread happiness and joy around her to an extent Big, and if a woman sees her period in her dream, this is a sign that she will be able to overcome many things that were very upset and will be more comfortable in her life in the coming days. If a woman sees menstruation during her sleep, it means that she will soon have a lot of money , which will greatly improve her living conditions, and she will be very proud of herself for what she will be able to achieve. Menstruation in a dream for a single woman. Menstruation in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the approach of her marriage to a good, handsome man who will make her days happy and compensate her for all the hardships she has gone through. It is said that the menstrual cycle Black hair in a dream indicates that she will fall into crises and face some problems in the coming days, and seeing menstruation foretells the dreamer that she will hear good news about one of her friends in the near future. Her wedding date is approaching. Menstrual blood that comes out of the vagina in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will become pregnant

title: Interpretation of a dream about pronouncing the testimony of Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of a dream about reciting the two testimonies of faith by Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin. The two testimonies are the testimony that there is no god but God and that Muhammad is the Messenger of God, and uttering them in a dream has many interpretations. It can be evidence of resolving a dispute between the two parties or someone who wants to testify to the truth, and the interpretations differ according to the owner. The dream is whether it is a man or a woman, a bride or a virgin, and here we will show you all the available interpretations about seeing the pronunciation of the two testimonies. Interpretation of seeing the pronunciation of the two testimonies in a dream Pronouncement of the testimony in a dream and the dreamer saying that he testifies that there is no god but God and that Muhammad is the Messenger of God His life. Pronouncement of the testimony in a dream has many connotations, which are as follows: This is evil and testified that he made the two testimonies a sign of repentance and abandonment of sin. Who was this? Poor and he thinks that he testifies in the abundance of food Who was this? A merchant and saying that he testifies indicates an abundance of livelihood in his trade. Who was this? Will He saw that he speaks his testimony, it is an alternative to healing and stopping the disease. If it was the creation of knowledge, it indicates the ease of his life affairs, and the ease of the paths of knowledge before him. Who was this? The overflow This indicates the repayment of debts. Interpretation of the testimony In general, see Pronouncement of the testimony in a dream shows that he is honest and has withdrawn from the world and shows that joy and happiness will enter his heart. Interpretation of seeing speaking a testimony for an unmarried woman Pronouncement of the testimony indicates a happy marriage and comfort in life. Testimony in a married woman's dream A lady when she sees it Pronouncing the Shahada indicates good news and the proximity of pregnancy or the fulfillment of a desired wish and happiness and goodness that will prevail soon. Seeing a pregnant woman indicates the proximity of comfort and ease in his life affairs. Look at the Shahada before death If the dreamer sees that he is dying, the Shahada is recited before death. He declares his faith and certainty in God's command and his certainty in a matter after the doubt and anxiety that revolve in his mind, and that he is right in the matter, and it may also symbolize safety and a fortress against the whispers of Satan, and there is another interpretation in the expense, whether it is money or children. Who believes that? In the care of God Almighty, the Shahada is issued. It heralds goodness, grace and mercy for the people of the house, and casts away the distress and calamities woven by haters and envious people, and excels in the works of life. This indicates an ascetic future and enjoys righteousness. It also indicates the state of the dead who spoke with the testimony of God Almighty, and had a high position in heaven, and whoever was forgiven by a good word, or a good deed, or a good deed, or a righteous son who prays for him. Interpretation of pronouncing the testimony in a dream Al-Osaimi Interpretation of dreams Pronouncing the two testimonies It has many interpretations, and some see that pronouncing the two testimonies indicates repentance. Some see it as a sign of the proliferation of human sins, which makes him want to return to his Lord and repent for his sins. Others see it from the merchant’s point of view, indicating an abundance of livelihood, an abundance of goods, profit from trade, and earning a lot of money. Others believe that the poor will enjoy an abundance of money and many good things and that he will eliminate the poverty that surrounds him and afflicts him. Others see it as a happy tiding and the coming of marriages with the people of the house,
